title: Vattu: The Name & the Mark
description: The outer world knew it as year 855 of the Blue Age, but the nomads knew it unnumbered, in the midst of an age of river and grass with no beginning:The year VATTU was born.The Name & the Mark is the first book in the expansive story of Vattu, a girl from a nomadic tribe who is caught in the middle of a clash of cultures with an imperialistic civilization called Sahta.This book contains the entire first book of Vattu as originally published online , and extra material.
author: Evan Dahm
